Reviews.Title: “The terrible reviews were right!”
Reviews.Author: amylou91
Reviews.Content: didnt read reviews booked approached stay trepidation hoping previous negative reviews mistaken werent website misleading boutique hotelthe word describe reception foyer dingy slightly stayed standard clean comfortable bed frosted windows claustrophobic tv vcr attached bathroom flooded toilet wasnt properly cleaned website fails mention theres nightclub directly below hotel plays throbbing music audible hotel hours morning didnt sleep wink 3am closed recommend hotel youre huge night kings cross plan passing minute worth paying extra stay else
